body.name: CIVPOWER Portable Waist Clip Fan, 10000mAh Battery Personal Hands-free Belt Fan, 3 Speeds, Body Fan for Outdoor Works, Farm, Hiking, Camping, Gardening, Travel
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 31 mins
features: 【Powerful Cooling】Our waist fan is designed to provide you with cooling in summer. With a powerful 6500rpm motor, it generates a strong, cool airflow that feels like you have a portable air conditioner with you wherever you go. Body fan effectively forces away all the heat around your body, keeping you feeling refreshed and comfortable.

【Superb Usage Time】You can enjoy long-lasting coolness with the powerful 10,000mAh electric capacity of this belt fan and only takes 5-6 hours to fully charge. With three adjustable air speeds, you can customize your comfort level and enjoy up to 5-15 hours of coolness.

【Multifunctional to Use】Our person portable waist clip fan is more than just a fan, it's also a portable power bank! With its superb usage time, you won't have to worry about power outages, and you can even use it to charge your other electronic devices. Versatile design of under shirt fan is a must-have for any adventure.

【Unique Dual Clip Design】 This waist fan has a unique double-clip design that makes it easy to use in a variety of situations. The waist clip is designed for your belt or garment pocket, while the clothes clip is used for fixing clothes corners. It can keep the airflow going without sucking your clothes into the fan. Plus, it comes with a lanyard, so you can hang it around your neck as a necklace fan.

【Portable and Versatile】 The Mini Waist Fan is very lightweight and easy to carry, so you can take it with you wherever you go. It has a super wide range of applications, including outdoor work, camping, fishing, gardening, travel,etc. And it's also a suitable gift for your friends! Experience ultimate comfort and convenience with our powerful waist clip fan. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Note 1. It is recommended to fully charge the fan before use, at least 5-6 hours. And please make sure the power button is turned on before charging the fan. 2. In order to get better experience, you can use the clothes clip to fix the hem of clothes and it can keep the airflow going without sucking your clothes into the fan. 3. Please do not use this belt fan while charging. The lithium-ion battery used in this product has no memory function. Overcharging or over discharging will affect its service life. Therefore, please charge it in time and disconnect the power supply after it is fully charged.

Indicator Status 1. Red light flashing: Being charging 2. Four red lights stay on: Fully charged. 3. Blue light stays on: Working state. 4. Blue light flashing: The fan’s power is less than 5%, please charge it in time. Specification Weight: 0.75lb Working Time: 5-15 hours Charging Time: about 5-6 hours Input: 12V/2A Operation Guide 1.First dial the power button on the right. 2.Then press the fan switch for the low-grade wind. 3.Press the switch for the second/third time, switch to the medium/high-grade wind. 4.It can also be used as a portable power bank when only turn on the power button.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You need this!!
reviews.reviewText: Best portable fan EVER. The power behind this thing is AMAZING!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Definitivamente es un artículo que se convierte casi en necesidad para los días de muchos calor al aire libre . Incluso te puede funcionar en momentos donde no haya energía para recargar tus equipos ya que tiene una potente batería de 10000mAh.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The little fan that could
reviews.reviewText: This little fan was a blessing during the 2 week hot spell we had here in the mid-west. It puts out quite a bit of air for it's size and I wore it from around my neck to blow directly into my face. On the really hot days it was just blowing hot air at you but that is not the fault of the fan, and any air movement is welcomed, hot or not. The only down side to this fan is the lower than advertised battery life. 5-15 hours is what it claims. 3 hours is what I was getting on the highest setting. Any of the lower settings just didn't push enough air to my face and head while wearing it so I stuck with the highest setting resulting in lower battery life. This just meant it was always charging when not in use so it was ready for my next maintenance call out on the hot production floor. All said, I give this fan 2 thumbs ups and recommended it to everyone who inquired about it while I was using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Another comparison review
reviews.reviewText: I took the opportunity to order three of these waist clip type fans to compare features and functionality. But my major observation, and hence the 3 Star rating, is that they are too heavy for someone wearing running shorts, yoga pants or other spandex-type garments. Hanging it around your neck while doing kitchen prep might seem like a good idea, but lean forward and it ends up in the batter (or whatever you are preparing). Also, do you really need a fan while you're riding a bicycle at 15 miles per hour, creating your own wind?The problem with sticking a fan on your waistband and possibly under your shirt is that the shirt is going to get sucked into the fan. This Civpower Portable Waist Clip Fan (the black one) provides a small clip area just above the fan intake port to keep this from happening. The problem I see is that the shirt can flip over the clip or just come out of the clip completely. You don't want to be dealing with this during your exercise session. Also, I gave it a try while a friend critiqued the styling - Said it looked stupid (her word, not mine). The fan has 3 speeds and can charge your phone in an emergency (as long as you remembered to bring a charge cord along on your run, walk or bike ride). It also has a hard off/on switch that is helpful so that pressing the speed selector button when not in use doesn't accidentally turn the fan on. The waist clip is long, but not that tight - it relies on the length to keep it in position. Overall a decent unit except that it is the most expensive of the three at over 40 bucks (at the time of this writing).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. A lifesaver, perfect for my hot flashes has 3 settings and gives out alot of air. Pretty impressive, cannot be with it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars PUSHES SOME WIND! GREAT STUFF!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This little fan pushes some wind now! Nice compact size. Charges fast! No flashy bells and whistles. Just a hard blowing fan to clip on your belt, waistline, or cross body bag.I'm an Athletic Trainer so I'm outside in the Texas heat with my athletes alot. I sweat alot. Especially when the summer heat really starts warming up and two a days get going. This thing helps keep those back beads of sweat from rolling so frequently. Absolutely love this product and 100% recommend to anyone that has to get out in the hot elements.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered 2 at a time but I received 1 new and 1 old (no charging cord and a lot of dust). It's a scam and a waste of money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great travel fan!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This fan has an easy to use belt clip, but I decided to try it in the backseat to keep my rear facing toddler cool. It worked great. The battery is long lasting and keeps a nice steady flow of air towards her. It’s not overly strong, so it feels nice and not overbearing on the face. Good value!
